title: The Store
description: GOES BEHIND THE SCENES FOR A STORY WOMEN'S WEAR DAILY COULD NEVER TELL!a novel of Lehsons and Company of Tulsa Citywhere three daughters of a dying patriarch rule a world of beautiful people and indulge their own private obsessions…a novel of Powerwhere brutally ambitious men and women use blackmail, political influence, and their bodies to secure their status at the top…a novel of Glamour where famous designers dictate the images of the super-rich while catering to their own decadence…a novel of Sex, High Fashion, High Societyand the dirtiest tricks in the trade.
author: Knight Isaacson
